binding:binding.name: Free@Home Binding
binding:binding.description: This binding connects to Busch and JÃ¤ger FreeAtHome HomeAutomation system and supports gateway connection via bridge, scene activation, raffstore/shutter control (incl. raffstore groups), switch, dimmer, thermostat, weather station 4.3" touch with thermostat, and discovery. Events of the physical devices are fed back to binding. It is based on XMPP.rocks that is used to connect to system access point and simple json to parse json files. Disclaimer: This binding is a private contribution and is not an official B+J product. Thx a lot to all supporter during the development: @lassem, @TheSpirit, @Lucurus, @xlrx, @wojewsky, @jclohmann, @Slave84. Special thx @kjoglum for contributing websocket support. Thanks to Christian Schudt (Babbler) for help with customizing code for XMPP over websocket.
